overview:
Dr. Troy Dreiling has been providing chiropractic services to Portland Metropolitan families for 18years. He believes that adjustments in the body and attitude go way beyond an office visit, and into the heart.

Zenaptic Chiropractic was voted “Best in Clark County” by the Clark County Chamber of Commerce because of Dreiling’s community involvement and commitment to community health. Also Vote Readers Choice Award by the Columbian 3 years now.

Dreiling believes a healthy lifestyle is an undeniable component to one’s health. His mission, to serve as many people possible with natural, safe, and effective solutions to achieve the body’s optimal state of being and to provide superior education inspiring others to create a healthier “you”, community, and planet. The relationship between activity and health is the foundation of Dreiling’s practice. Maximized Living Makeovers and run/walk clubs are keystones to Dreiling’s commitment to his patients and promoting a healthy lifestyle.
